thread.title: Vubiz Announces New Course on Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity
thread.title_full: Vubiz Announces New Course on Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity

author: Vubiz Elearning
title: Vubiz Announces New Course on Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity
text:
Vubiz is excited to launch a new elearning course: Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action for Managers and Supervisors in the United States. This new elearning course helps companies comply with government regulations. All companies that hold federal government contracts and subcontracts are required to comply with U.S. Department of Labor Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs (OFCCP) regulations. Failure to comply could result in significant fines and lost government contracts, or suspension of a current contract.
Vubiz President Jim Rapino said this course increases awareness and helps companies stay in compliance, “ given the risks and active government enforcement - this elearning course helps managers comply by giving an introduction to EEO and AA requirements and an understanding of practices that help with compliance.”
This one hour elearning module is available now.
